name: Sherpak Deluxe Universal Kayak Carrier
description: A secure, affordable way to get your kayak from A to B. The foam block cut-out is compatible with Yakima®, Thule®, and most standard factory roof racks. It also has a non-skid, anti-slip bottom intended for use on vehicles without racks. A simple carrier at a simply fantastic price.Coated hook tips prevent scratches to your car's finish.Blocks have generous surface area to distribute a kayak's weight evenly. This provides stability and lowers the chance of denting.Includes 2, 40cm (16in.) high-density foam contoured blocks, two V-style bow / stern straps, and 2 over-the-hull straps for extra stability.Includes a mesh bag for storing components when not in use.
